Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 4 lines of greek. Receipt for poll tax.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392590) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392590)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.6; 92-93)
